description: Lists all custom apps or service apps for the given simulation and domain.

parameters.name: Simulation
parameters.description: The name of the simulation that you want to list apps for.

nested_items.name: Apps
nested_items.description: The list of apps for the given simulation and domain.

nested_items.name: Domain
nested_items.description: The domain of the app. For more information about domains, see Key concepts: Domains in the SimSpace Weaver User Guide.

nested_items.name: Simulation
nested_items.description: The name of the simulation of the app.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the app.

nested_items.name: TargetStatus
nested_items.description: The desired status of the app.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If SimSpace Weaver returns nextToken, then there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page, call the operation again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. If no results remain, then nextToken is set to null. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. If you provide a token that isn't valid, then you receive an HTTP 400 ValidationException error.
